description.h2: A label linkbase must not have a definition for an element defined in a standard taxonomy.
description.p: The rule prevents an extension linkbase from removing the documentation from a published element. This is important for comparability and to prevent contradictory definitions for elements.

REMARK: This only applies to company extension linkbases. If edgartaxonomies.xml were to list a standard taxonomy linkbase containing 'documentation' label roles, then that standard taxonomy linkbase would be included in a 'good' testcase variation.

variation.name: 6.10.5, Custom documentation on a custom element, GOOD.
variation.description: Custom documentation on a custom element, GOOD.

variation.name: 6.10.5, Custom documentation on dei element, NOGOOD.
variation.description: Custom documentation on dei element, NOGOOD.
